com.bookify.jpa.api

Class BookifyApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.ws.rs.core.Application
      • com.bookify.jpa.api.BookifyApi

  • @Path(value="/v1.0")
 @ApplicationPath(value="/api")
public class BookifyApi
extends javax.ws.rs.core.Application
    This class contains the API Methods that calls on the business logic part and returns information to the users.
